ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // {Barret}
“There ain't no train
that goes up there anymore…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Tifa}
“How do we get to the Shinra Building?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // {Tifa}
“Well, let's go to {CYAN}Wall Market{WHITE}.
We might be able to find something there.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // [Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.
createLineTrigger({x1:-22, y1:98, z1:0, x2:46, y2:98, z2:0});
createLineTrigger({x1:-7, y1:-22, z1:0, x2:76, y2:-18, z2:0});
ops.raw: d0 f9 ff ea ff 00 00 4c 00 ee ff 00 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // {Cloud}
“Through Sector 6 to get to Sector 7.
I should be able to do it alone…”
createLineTrigger({x1:-7, y1:-22, z1:0, x2:76, y2:-18, z2:0});

ops.description: Bank[6][5] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

dialogStrings:
{Tifa}
“How do we get to the Shinra Building?”

{Barret}
“There ain't no train
that goes up there anymore…”

{Tifa}
“Well, let's go to {CYAN}Wall Market{WHITE}.
We might be able to find something there.”

{Cloud}
“Through Sector 6 to get to Sector 7.
I should be able to do it alone…”

[Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.
